comments:
I20060428-1315

Trying to perform an update on a file that has already been deleted remotely results in the following stack:

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.UpdateContentCachingService.buildRemoteTree(UpdateContentCachingService.java:157)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.CVSWorkspaceRoot.getRemoteTree(CVSWorkspaceRoot.java:169)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.syncinfo.CVSResourceVariantTree.fetchVariant(CVSResourceVariantTree.java:82)
at org.eclipse.team.core.variants.AbstractResourceVariantTree.refresh(AbstractResourceVariantTree.java:85)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.syncinfo.CVSResourceVariantTree.refresh(CVSResourceVariantTree.java:330)
at org.eclipse.team.core.variants.AbstractResourceVariantTree.refresh(AbstractResourceVariantTree.java:55)
at org.eclipse.team.core.variants.ResourceVariantTreeSubscriber.refresh(ResourceVariantTreeSubscriber.java:162)
at org.eclipse.team.core.variants.ResourceVariantTreeSubscriber.refresh(ResourceVariantTreeSubscriber.java:126)
at org.eclipse.team.core.subscribers.Subscriber.refresh(Subscriber.java:459)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSWorkspaceSubscriber.refreshWithContentFetch(CVSWorkspaceSubscriber.java:434)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.mappings.WorkspaceSubscriberContext.refresh(WorkspaceSubscriberContext.java:305)
at org.eclipse.team.ui.synchronize.ModelParticipantMergeOperation.initializeContext(ModelParticipantMergeOperation.java:71)
at org.eclipse.team.ui.synchronize.ModelMergeOperation.execute(ModelMergeOperation.java:123)
at org.eclipse.team.ui.synchronize.ModelParticipantMergeOperation.execute(ModelParticipantMergeOperation.java:88)
at org.eclipse.team.ui.synchronize.ModelOperation.run(ModelOperation.java:106)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.actions.JobRunnableContext.run(JobRunnableContext.java:144)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.actions.JobRunnableContext$ResourceJob.runInWorkspace(JobRunnableContext.java:72)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.InternalWorkspaceJob.run(InternalWorkspaceJob.java:38)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

Created an attachment (id=40243)
Patch

This patch adds a null check to the UpdateContentCachingService.
